Title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
Overview: After seeking to live a normal life, Logan sets out to avenge the death of his girlfriend by undergoing the mutant Weapon X program and becoming Wolverine.
production_companies: Ingenious Film Partners, Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation, Donners' Company, Dune Entertainment, Seed Productions, Bad Hat Harry Productions, Big Screen Productions, Marvel Enterprises
Cast: Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Danny Huston
